      • SetContentToDocument

        public static com.ser.blueline.IDocument SetContentToDocument(com.ser.blueline.ISession session,
                                                              com.ser.blueline.IDocument doc,
                                                              byte[] content,
                                                              java.lang.String fileName,
                                                              boolean enableFulltext)
                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Add content to Doxis4 Document and removes all other content if it was setted before
        Parameters:
        session - Doxis4 Session Object
        doc - Document object
        content - byte array with file to be added to Document
        fileName - file name
        enableFulltext - enable fulltext for this file
        Returns:
        same Document object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there will be some problems while adding new content to document
        See Also:
        ISession, IDocument

      • FindInformationObjects

        public static com.ser.blueline.IInformationObject[] FindInformationObjects(com.ser.blueline.ISession session,
                                                                           java.lang.String archiveClassID,

                                                                           java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> fields)
        Find information objects with using of default query dialog, list of descriptor names and information object
        Parameters:
        session - Doxis4 Session Object
        archiveClassID - Name, FQN or ID of Archive [Folder] class
        queryClassID - Name, FQN or ID of Query class
        fields - Map of Name of Field - Value of descriptors that must be used for searching
        Returns:
        array of infromation object that wiil be found. Returns null if nothing will be found.
        See Also:
        ISession

      • FindInformationObjects

        public static com.ser.blueline.IInformationObject[] FindInformationObjects(com.ser.blueline.ISession session,
                                                                           java.lang.String archiveClassID,
                                                                           java.lang.String queryClassID,
                                                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> fields,
                                                                           com.ser.blueline.IInformationObject informationObject)
        Find information objects with using of default query dialog, list of descriptor names and information object
        Parameters:
        session - Doxis4 Session Object
        archiveClassID - Name, FQN or ID of Archive [Folder] class
        queryClassID - Name, FQN or ID of Query class
        fields - names of descriptors of information object, that must be used for searching
        informationObject - information object with values
        Returns:
        array of infromation object that wiil be found. Returns null if nothing will be found.
        See Also:
        ISession, IInformationObject

      • FindInformationObjects

        public static com.ser.blueline.IInformationObject[] FindInformationObjects(com.ser.blueline.ISession session,
                                                                           java.lang.String archiveClassID,
                                                                           java.lang.String queryClassID,
                                                                           java.lang.String sql)
        Find information objects with using of default query dialog and sql query
        Parameters:
        session - Doxis4 Session Object
        archiveClassID - Name, FQN or ID of Archive [Folder] class
        queryClassID - Name, FQN or ID of Query class
        sql - sql-query with params of searching
        Returns:
        array of infromation object that wiil be found. Returns null if nothing will be found.
        See Also:

      • FindInformationObjectsBySQL

        public static com.ser.blueline.IInformationObject[] FindInformationObjectsBySQL(com.ser.blueline.ISession session,
                                                                                InformationObjects.FindInformationObjectsBySQLType archiveType,
                                                                                java.lang.String archiveName,
                                                                                java.lang.String sql,
                                                                                int hitLimit)
                                                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Find information objects with using of ready SQL-query
        Parameters:
        session - Doxis4 Session Object
        archiveType - Type of searching information object
        archiveName - Name of DB Name
        sql - SQL query
        hitLimit - limit of documents count. -1 for default value
        Returns:
        Array of founded Information object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there will be some problems with searching
        See Also:
        ISession, InformationObjects.FindInformationObjectsBySQLType
